LanguageData.Apini.label: apini
LanguageData.Apini.description: Genetically modified giant sentient bee-ings. Originally created by humans as a terraforming bio-tool for the proliferation of angiosperms, these flightless bees are found on countless terraformed rimworlds.\n Apini are often wiped out by the point a planet reaches urbworld status. \n They possess some mamalian DNA, such as complex lung structure. Apini will also happily intergrate themselves into human "hives" if they feel like they have purpose.
LanguageData.ApiniPlayer.label: apini
LanguageData.ApiniPawn.label: apini
LanguageData.ApiniOverseer.label: overseer
LanguageData.ApiniPlayerTribe.label: Tribal Hive
LanguageData.ApiniTribe.label: tribal hive
LanguageData.ApiniTribe.description: A tribal hive of Apini, they toil hard and long everyday to survive. Apini are not the most intelligent sort, many communities never surpassing a neolithic level of technology. They range from friendly to outright hostile, depending on their previous interactions with humans. \n \nThey are often raided for their delicious honey.
LanguageData.ApiniSmoke.label: respiratory failure
LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.0.label: respiratory failure
LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.1.label: respiratory failure
LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.2.label: respiratory failure
LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.3.label: respiratory failure
LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.3.description: I feel like i'm suffocating! Somebody help me!

LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.4.description: I feel like i'm suffocating! Somebody help me!

LanguageData.ApiniSmokeThought.stages.5.description: I feel like i'm suffocating! Somebody help me!

LanguageData.FillHoneyFermentingVat.label: fill fermenting vats
LanguageData.TakeHoneyOutOfFermentingVat.label: take honey out of fermenting vat
LanguageData.LostHive.label: Rebuild the Hive
LanguageData.LostHive.description: Territorial humans burnt down your hive, and performed unceremonious regicide upon your queen. You and some other survivors have taken all you could salvage from the wreckage of your hive. \n\n With hopes of rebuilding your hive, you set forth.
LanguageData.LostHive.scenario.name: Rebuild the Hive
LanguageData.LostHive.scenario.summary: Five lost Apini attempt to rebuild their ransacked hive.
LanguageData.LostHive.scenario.description: Territorial humans burnt down your hive, and performed unceremonious regicide upon your queen. You and some other survivors have taken all you could salvage from the wreckage of your hive. \n\n With hopes of rebuilding your hive, you set forth.
LanguageData.ApiniApron.label: apini apron
LanguageData.ApiniApron.description: A basic work apron often worn by Apini. Worn to combat the cold or provide the guise of human decency.
LanguageData.ApiniWaxFloor.label: beeswax floor
LanguageData.ApiniWaxFloor.description: Floor made from beeswax. Has a sweet aroma.
LanguageData.PlantFrostbell.label: frostbell
LanguageData.PlantFrostbell.description: A unique flower that has been cultivated by the apini for centuries. It is often cool to the touch.
LanguageData.ApiniWax.label: beeswax
LanguageData.ApiniWax.description: Wax produced by Apini. Often used for constucting sturdy buildings.
LanguageData.ApiniHoney.label: apini honey
LanguageData.ApiniHoney.description: Delicious honey produced by the apini.
LanguageData.HoneyCapsule.label: honey capsule
LanguageData.HoneyCapsule.description: A hexagonal container for creating honey from unflavored nectar.
LanguageData.Pollen.label: pollen
LanguageData.Pollen.description: A ball of pollen and nectar gathered from flowers. The vital ingredient to make honey.
LanguageData.ApiniInsect.label: ate cooked insect meat
LanguageData.ApiniInsect.description: I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. Eating kin like this is disgusting.
LanguageData.ApiniInsectDirect.label: ate insect meat
LanguageData.ApiniInsectDirect.description: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. Eating kin like this is utterly awful. I wanna hurl.
LanguageData.Caravan_Apini_BulkGoods.label: bulk goods trader
LanguageData.BeeswaxMaking.label: Creating Beeswax
LanguageData.BeeswaxMaking.description: Beeswax can be produced by Apini at a crafting spot.
LanguageData.ApiniMakingHoney.label: Creating Honey
LanguageData.ApiniMakingHoney.description: Delicous honey is produced from pollen harvested from plants such as Frostbell and Vigorbloom. The pollen is first distilled into nectar, then placed in a vat and fermented into honey.
